column1: In  view  of  the  foregoing  reasons,  it  is  apparent  that  the  Petitioner  has  failed  to
establish a case that warrants a remedy by way of judicial review. Thus, the Order
of the learned High Court Judge refusing to grant a writ of certiorari and mandamus

column2: ence, I am not inclined to grant reliefs prayed by the Appellant in the prayer to
